document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA LOW-LEVEL RADIOACTIVE WASTE GENERATOR REGULATORY POLICY ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-226, the “District of Columbia Low-Level Radioactive Waste Generator Regulatory Policy Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-378, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1990, and December 18, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-309 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
